page.title: 10Employment (2)
page.content: Small enterprises in the Bickmarsh, Cleeve Prior and Littleton area include a{Body Repair Shop and {Breakdown Service;}employing two people,two{Battery Egg Packing } {Stations;}both averaging eight thousand birds, laying approximately ten thousand eggs a day, which are graded and sold to local hotels and restaurants, a{Sub Post Office, a {Steel Fabrication Service;}erecting steel frames for local needs, a { {Playgroup;}with thirty children on roll, {Rose Cultivation;} seventy two thousand rose bushes are grown on approximately two acres of land, a {Riding School;}established in l959, with stabling for one hundred horses and employing six people, and finally a {Gliding Club;}employing three full time staff instructors and tug pilots.
